definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: While reluctant to criticize the status quo, the guides often let things slip out in conversation.
sentences.chinese: 導遊不願意批評現狀，但在交談中會不時漏嘴。

sentences.english: May I ask your guider to speak with you.
sentences.chinese: 我讓您的導遊跟您說，好嗎？
李導遊對此倒是一副外交辭令。

sentences.english: Road map guide attractions and changes to extensions.
sentences.chinese: 導遊圖的景點和道路的修改擴充功能。

sentences.english: Courier and consolidator deals are long-gone, but there are other alternatives.
sentences.chinese: 導遊與特別待遇已經遠去，但還有其他是選擇。
這是世博園區的導遊圖，您目前的位置是在這裏。

sentences.english: Only on hearing this did he change his mind. This unpleasant event made me quite unhappy.
sentences.chinese: 這次大煞風景的導遊，令我頗爲不快。

sentences.english: I went to the seven star park and got on the seven star rock.
sentences.chinese: 在導遊的帶領下，我去了七星公園和七星巖上。

sentences.english: I'd like to hire a guide to show me the town tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我想僱個導遊明天帶我參觀這個城市。

sentences.english: The organization is also paying to train local guides on how to stop theft and illegal tree-cutting.
sentences.chinese: 該組織還支付培訓如何制止盜竊和非法伐木當地導遊。

sentences.english: The guide pointed out the best-known ancient articles in the museum.
sentences.chinese: 導遊指出博物館中幾件最著名的文物。

sentences.english: The black cow guide figure "Gako-chan" explains operation methods.
sentences.chinese: 擔當導遊的黑牛“亞牯”說明操作方法。

sentences.english: The guide led us into that mountain.
We try to bridge the gap between guidebooks and tour guides.
sentences.chinese: 我們努力彌補旅遊指南和導遊的不足。

sentences.english: He was climbing with his father and three Sherpa guides.
sentences.chinese: 他和他父親以及其他三個夏巴導遊一起登珠峯。

definition: to lead a group/leader of a group/captain (of sports squad)
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
